price: 49.Nabiyow woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) umeyniitih yan mara silsilootat axawah anuk, gaboobii kee ibitte keenik ittat saxiqqi heenih xibbaanah anuk ken table.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
